attributes.title: House Oakheart
attributes.allegiance: House Tyrell'''House Oakheart''' is a vassal house from the Reach that holds fealty to House Tyrell. Its seat is Old Oak.==Members==* Ser Arys Oakheart, a member of the Kingsguard. Currently in Dorne serving as the sworn shield of Princess Myrcella Baratheon.==In the books==In ''A Song of Ice and Fire'', House Oakheart is an old and powerful family from the Reach. They are among the noble houses from the Reach that can trace their descent from Garth Greenhand. The house is headed by Lady Arwyn Oakheart, a loyal vassal of Mace Tyrell and Ser Arys' mother. The Oakheart sigil is three green leaves on a golden plain.==See also==*AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)Reach HousesCategory:Vassal houses
attributes.sigil: Three green leaves on a golden plain

sections.In the books: In ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'', House Oakheart is an old and powerful family from the Reach. They are among the noble houses from the Reach that can trace their descent from [[Garth Greenhand]]. The house is headed by Lady Arwyn Oakheart, a loyal vassal of [[Mace Tyrell]] and Ser Arys' mother. The Oakheart sigil is three green leaves on a golden plain.
sections.Members: * Ser [[Arys Oakheart]], a member of the [[Kingsguard]]. Currently in [[Dorne]] serving as the sworn shield of Princess [[Myrcella Baratheon]].
